EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 84 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
VICINITY 34-02.586N  014-17.490E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
